post3.title: What is the difference between C and C++?
post3.text: The main theme of C and C++ is same. But C++ is a super set of C programming language. There are many time saving libaries in C++ by default which are not available in C. C++ is basically updated version of C with some extra features. But we cant ignore C cause it is the mother of almost all modern languages. It give us the basic knoledge about how a program works.
